scripts.build_ci: npm ci && npm run test && tsc -p ./ && npm pack && aws s3 cp . s3://$S3_BUCKET_ID/ --recursive --exclude '*' --include '*.tgz'
scripts.clean_dir_all: npm install --save-dev glob && npm install --save-dev rimraf && npm run clean_demo && npm run clean_sdk
scripts.build_demo_win: cd ../demo && npm uninstall -S raygun4reactnative && npm install raygun4reactnative-%npm_package_version%.tgz && npm i
scripts.build_demo_mac_lin: cd ../demo && npm uninstall -S raygun4reactnative && npm install raygun4reactnative-$npm_package_version.tgz && npm i
scripts.build_no_run_win: npm run clean_dir_all && npm run build_sdk && npm run local_copy_sdk && npm run build_demo_win
scripts.fully_automated_win: npm run clean_dir_all && npm run build_sdk && npm run local_copy_sdk && npm run build_demo_win && npm run run_demo
scripts.fully_automated_mac,lin: npm run clean_dir_all && npm run build_sdk && npm run local_copy_sdk && npm run build_demo_mac_lin && npm run run_demo
